mapper.select: select actionuser_id from t_workflowstep where relateddomain_id=#{id} and status='0'

select a.id, a.relateddomain, a.relateddomain_id as relateddomainId, a.prestep_id as prestepId, a.step_desc as stepDesc, a.actionuser_id as actionuserId , a.action_time as action_time, a.action_result as actionResult , a.file_url as fileUrl, a.action_comment as actionComment, a.enable, a.status as status,b.status as bstatus from t_workflowstep a left join project_application b on a.relateddomain_id=b.id where relateddomain_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
